extendedInfo.description: Now recharge your prepaid mobile on the go with Easy Mobile Recharge App â a lightweight, secure and fast app with complete tariff detail to help you chose the right topup.After the resounding success of easymobilerecharge.com (thanks to our users!), much awaited Easy Mobile Recharge App is simply one of the best apps where online recharge is concerned. DOWNLOAD IT & EXPERIENCE the best and the fastest RECHARGE APP for Android.Features- All Netbanking/ Debit Card/ Credit Card payment options available - No Extra charge for recharge- All Mobile Opererators Supported- All DTH Operators Supported- All Data Card Recharge available- Fastest recharge with Easy Wallet- Latest Tariff Palns with Full Talktime, SMS Packs, Internet Packs, 2G Packs, 3G Packs etc.Download EasyMobileRecharge App & feel the difference!For any queries or improvements, please write in to info@easymobilerecharge.com.

reviews.title: Wildfire

reviews.title: Worst service ever
reviews.comment: Third class crap app. I have recharged my dth number thru this fxxxk app.money got deducted from bank.money is in their wallet.contacted the customer service and they asked me to recharge mobile with my amount instead of dth. If they dnt have this option they should inform as other apps do if its fail or should return the amount. Never go for this app to recharge.this is the worst app ever i used for recharging.this crap service doesnt have telephone number to contact either. paytm is best.
reviews.author: Ligi Abraham

reviews.title: Pathetic product and poor service
reviews.comment: I tried to recharge my number, they deducted the money and did NOT recharge. They say that the money will be refunded but did not do so either. Dont use them else u will lose ur money.
